NOTES: African Union Mission in Somalia troops and particularly Ugandan troops who are based at the KM4 junction in Mogadishu shot dead a boy.

NOTES: African peacekeeping [Ugandan] forces in Mogadishus main airport have killed two civilian near the airport.

NOTES: AMISOM forces wounded several Somali fishermen when they destroyed fishing Dhows in close proximity to the port.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Several artillery rounds allegedly fired by AMISOM forces landed inside Bakara market, Howlwadaag district, killing two civilians and injuring six others.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2004-2012)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: At least 10 civilians were killed and 15 others injured in heavy fighting between Somali government forces and insurgents in the Somalias restive capital Mogadishu.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: African Union troops from Uganda and Burundi who are guarding the Transitional Federal Government of Somalia [TFG] have shot dead two Somali youth in Mogadishu.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An AU peacekeeper has today killed three people and injured four others in Mogadishus Makka Al-Mukaramma Road.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2004-2012)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: At least 16 civilians were killed in the fighting that followed insurgents attack on the parliament.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces opened fire on a fishing boat and killed one person and wounded three others.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: MISOM forces shot and killed a person on KM4 road heading to Aden Adde International Airport. No reason was given for the killing.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: African Union Mission in Somalia troops [AMISOM] and particularly those from Burundi who are based at the Jaalle Siyad Police Academy have spread a public transport vehicle with bullets after it briefly stopped in front of their base. Three people were wounded.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2004-2012)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: New clashes between Somali insurgents and government troops backed by African Union forces killed four civilians and wounded 29.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2004-2012)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: 2 civilians were killed and 17 others injured when TFG/AMISOM forces launched attacks against AOGs in Hodan and Howlwaddag districts.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2004-2012)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: 2 civilians were killed and 17 others injured when TFG/AMISOM forces launched attacks against AOGs in Hodan and Howlwaddag districts.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM [African Union Mission in Somalia] peacekeepers opened fire on civilians at the road that connects Kilometre Four to Mogadishu airport, killing 4.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An artillery round presumably fired by AMISOM landed in Yaakshiid District killing a newly-wed couple and injuring another woman.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A local media reports that AMISOM soldiers manning the check-point at the entrance of the Mogadishu port opened fire by mistake at a group of porters coming back to the port after having finished eating (Sahuur). Two porters have been reported killed and four others injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: Journalists (Somalia)
NOTES: 02/09 a Malaysian media crew covering the intervention of a Malaysian charity that had just arrived in Mogadishu was shot at by an AMISOM convoy in the vicinity of K4. One journalist was killed and another injured. The incident probably illustrates the state of tension of the AMISOM soldiers - always under threat of an IED/suicide attack, the absence of visual recognition of humanitarian agencies/journalists and their armed escorts and a possible lack of preparation on the side of many new agencies/charities/journalists who have flooded Mogadishu since the beginning of August.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces manning a check-point in the vicinity of Rajo IDP camp in Jazira area opened fire at a group of people who were burying body parts of one of the victims of an RCIED attack that had taken place in Medina district earlier in the day. Three people were reported killed and four others injured in the shooting. AMISOM soldiers were reported having in the dark mistakenly assessed that the group was planting an IED in proximity of their check-point.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2004-2012)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: TFG/AMISOM forces conducting a security operation in Darmooley village on 06/03 reportedly shot and killed a man and injured his son in Darmooley village after suspecting them of being AS operatives. TFG/AMISOM forces also arrested another man but later released him.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Pro-TFG/AMISOM (KDF) forces clashed with AS militias in Ceel-Cadde village 50km SW of Garbaharey on 23/08. The two sides reportedly engaged in a heavy fighting in which artillery guns were used. Another AS unit reportedly destroyed a KDF armoured vehicle after ambushing a KDF convoy rushing to support their colleagues in the village. One civilian was killed and a number of houses were destroyed. Unconfirmed report indicates that 30 combatants were killed during the fighting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A Kenyan soldier with the African Union force in Somalia killed six people, all thought to be civilians, when he fired on them, a spokesman for the Kenyan Defence Forces said Monday.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces reportedly shot and killed man for refusing to stop at a checkpoint. Locals believe the man had a mental disability and was unable to follow instructions.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces reportedly killed seven civilians in Jiro Yasin Village in Wanla Weyne District on 15/01. The exact motive of the killing is unclear. Local media accounts over what happened seem to differ. There are suggestions the seven - three children and four elderly persons - were killed in a crossfire as AMISOM forces battled suspected al Shabaab fighters. Others suggest the killing may have been deliberate. Following the attack, al Shanaab released a statement vowing revenge upon AMISOM over the killing of the towns civilians.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM troops attacked a number of homes in a pre-dawn raid against the town of Leego, killing seven or eight civilians, including five children. Local leaders say that the troops attacked the homes indiscriminately, and killed camels and goats outside. The elder of the town speculated that the forces had mistaken the homes for a rebel camp.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A driver of a civilian lorry was shot and killed by AMISOM forces while approaching Medina gate (access to AMISOM base in Mogadishu airport) in the afternoon of 03/08. AMISOM soldiers reportedly fired warning shots then attempted to shoot at the tires of the vehicles after the driver had ignored their instructions to stop.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A 20-year-old is kidnapped and raped by AMISOM solders.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A Djiboutian soldier guarding the border between Djibouti and Somaliland shot and injured a civilian man on 11/01. Reports indicate that the man was smuggling Khat through the border when the incident happened. The injured man was taken to Djibouti for treatment.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces in Baydhaabo have killed a civilian who was buying goods at a market. The motive for the killing is not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and Somali soldiers based in Danow village reportedly summarily executed three mini-bus drivers in the evening of 08/03. The three men were suspected of having facilitated the transport of suspected al Shabaab operatives that had attacked an AMISOM/Somali position a few hours before.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali a AMISOM forces conducted a joint security operation in Arafat, Towfiiq and Barwaaqo neighbourhoods (Yaaqshiid and Dayniile districts) in the early morning of 13/03. The joint forces arrested an unknown number of people. Two men were reportedly shot and killed by Somali forces in Towfiiq neighbourhood for undisclosed reasons.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Ethiopia (1991-2018)
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: Al Shabaab; Aid Workers (Somalia)
NOTES: AMISOM/ENDF contingent shot and killed a man from Rahaweyn/Jiroon sub-clan in Dhurey (20kms SE of Waajid) in the night of 12/06 after suspecting him of being an AS operative on a reconnaissance mission. The ENDF are in the village providing security to food aid donated by the Turkish government.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Independent sources confirm that AMISOM forces opened fire at civilians, killing one person and injuring at least six others, when AMISOM forces came under RCIED attack. AMISOM and governor deny the claim.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces in Buulo Mareer opened fire at a vehicle carrying Khat in the evening of 31/08 after suspecting it as a hostile. Four Khat dealers were killed and the vehicle was also seriously damaged.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An AMISOM convoy opened fire at a public mini-bus in Tabeelaha Sheikh Ibrahim (Hodan District) in the afternoon of 13/09. Reports indicate that the soldiers open fire after the mini-bus approached at the convoy. The conductor of the mini-bus was killed. The AMISOM convoy continues its journey after the incident.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM (ENDF)/SNG forces based in Ceel Garas (40km SE of Dhusamareeb) in the night of 24/09. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about an hour after which the attackers withdrew. Ten combatants were reportedly killed while unspecified numbers were injured. Following the clash Ethiopian forces killed two civilians, despite not believe they were associated with al Shabaab. The reasons for the killings are not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces shoot and kill three elders and wounded four others after their convoy was attacked in Markas Ruusiya and Bayturaas neighbourhoods (coded separately). [Witnesses] said the Amisom convoy came under grenade attacks in several locations in the town. Following the attacks, Amisom soldiers entered homes and shot civilians, including the local elders.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces reportedly killed three civilians, including a traditional elder in Marka. The reason for the killings are not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Dec 16. Amisom [African Union Mission in Somalia] troops killed one civilian and wounded three others in the town of Marka after being attacked by unidentified persons with a hand grenade. In addition to this violence, AMISOM are believed to responsible for civilian deaths in Marka several days prior.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces killed a number of civilians in the vicinity of the scene of a clash with Al Shabaab. Hormuud telecommunication network in Rabdhure, Ceel Barde and Waajid is back to operational following three days of switch off due to AMISOM convoys movement.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Residents in the town of Rab Dhuure reported that Ethiopian troops who suffered causalities from an Al Shabaab attack have killed pastoralists in revenge for the attack by militants, killing ten civilians.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: Muslim Group (Somalia)
NOTES: Nov 7. Following a grenade attack by unidentified assailants, confirmed reports indicate that AMISOM forces entered a mosque (Al-Raxmah) in Marka town and killed the imam and his assistant inside the mosque.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: Students (Somalia)
NOTES: AMISOM convoy opened fire against 3 public buses in SOS neighbourhood in the afternoon of 21/07. The motive is unknown and one student died while unknown number was injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces conducted a search and security operation in Baytaruus neighbourhood to flash out suspected al Shabaab elements in the morning of 21/07. The forces did house to house searches and recovered some guns. The operation went out of hand after some people were shot and killed by AMISOM in their houses and other inhabitants also opened fire. Unconfirmed reports indicate that 13 civilians (some sources claim 19) were killed and around 20 wounded during the operation.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Following an RCIED attack in a AMISOM water browser, security forces went on a security operation in the neighbourhood and killed six civilians at a wedding party.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF forces were firing at a private mini-bus, which travelled from Beled Weyne to Halgan (41 KM north of Bulo Burte) in the afternoon of 08/08. Six people have been reported dead. It is believed the ENDF forces thought them to be al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM-Ethiopian forces open fire on a bus carrying civilians, five dead. The shootings took place along Beled Weyne-Halgan Road. The reason of the attack is not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Police Forces of Ethiopia (1991-2018) Liyu Police
NOTES: ENDF/Liyu Police paramilitaries opened fire at a civilian mini-bus, travelling from Bardaale to Gedo region in Qoond Hood (46 KM NE of Garbahaarey) on 27/08. First reports indicate that three civilians and the driver were killed. Motive is unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: A pastoralist man was shot and killed by ENDF after he tried to run away from them in Waarabali (26 KM SW of Baidoa) on 30/08. The man got scared after seeing the forces and was killed by a bullet in the back.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF forces on military operation raided Cel Qoxle (55 KM west of Bulo Burte) on 31/08. According to unconfirmed information, forces killed five civilians including a prominent Sheikh during the raid. No other casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces shoot and kill a young boy playing football near Mogadishu Stadium when he went to retrieve a ball near them.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Local media reported that AMISOM forces shot and killed a local elder in Gendershe village (20km NE of Marka) in the morning of 14/10. The victims wife was also injured by the AMISOM forces. The motive behind the murder is currently unclear.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces on foot patrol opened indiscriminate gunfire against civilians in Beyturaas neighbourhood (Marka) in the morning of 17/10. Reports indicate that there was neither threat or nor attack against AMISOM by the time of the shooting. One civilian was killed and another injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces conducted a security operation in Gamboole Village in Wanla Weyne District in the night of 04/01. The security operation was reportedly in a respond to earlier ambush against SNG forces in the area on 02/11. Local media reported that AMISOM forces killed a pastoralist during the operation and arrested three others however, neither AMISOM nor SNA have so far commented on the alleged killing.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM soldiers open fire on Warshadaha Road, causing fatalities and injuries. Witnesses said a civilian, cows, and goats were killed by shots fired by the soldiers. Specific causality numbers not known. The reason for the attack is not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED was targeted against an AMISOM convoy in the vicinity of Golweyn Village (21km SW of Marka) in the afternoon of 01/12. The explosion reportedly destroyed an AMISOM oil tanker. AMISOM forces captured and killed three civilian bystanders in retaliation of the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A member of AMISOM kills a civilian in Golweyn for unknown reason.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: On 16/04/2016, a civilian Toyota Carib, travelling from Buulo Mareer to Mogadishu met AMISOM soldiers outside Bulo Mareer (29 KM SW of Marka) who immediately shot at the bus, killing two civilian men, a 85 year old woman and a young girl.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: AMISOM forces killed four civilians (an older woman, a girl and two men, reportedly from the same family) near Buulo Mareer town (29km W of Marka) in the morning of 16/04. The victims were traveling from Buulo Mareer towards Mogadishu when Ugandan AMISOM soldiers opened fire against their vehicle. The AMISOM spokesman admitted the incident and stated that they regret the killing of innocent Somalis, adding that AMISOM and Somali Police Force are investigating the matter.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: An Ethiopian soldier shot and killed a man passing near the CP on the opposite side of the bridge in Dollow. The man was believed to have been alerted with warning shot where he refused to follow the warning. Other reports confirmed that the victim was mentally challenged.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An al Shabaab-planted IED destroys a vehicle in an AMISOM convoy near Mahadaay, causalities not immediately known. AU troops clashed with Al Shabab fighters shortly after explosion, causalities equally unknown in the subsequent clash. Sources said AMISOM soldiers have indiscriminately opened fire on a nearby civilians, killing a cattle herder and wounded four others after the Al Shabab militants ambush attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: A remote controlled IED targets an AMISOM-ENDF convoy at Rab Dhuure. No reported deaths. Though no group has claimed responsibility the source suspects al Shabaab. Following the blast the soldiers opened fire at nearby residents, killing two civilians.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: At least 14 Somali civilians were killed and three others wounded following a shooting between Ethiopian troops and al-Shabab fighters in War Diinle. Witnesses claim the ENDF forces opened fire indiscriminately on the civilians following the clash. No reported dead among the combatants.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Shaken by a roadside bomb that had hit their troop transport truck, AMISOM troops fired on a crowd that had gathered around the destroyed vehicle, killing 2 unarmed civilians and critically injuring several others.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces kill six civilians for unknown reason in Waaya Arag outside of Afgooye.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An al Shabaab RCIED targeted an AMISOM convoy in Ceelasha, damaging a vehicle. Following the explosion, AMISOM forces opened fire injuring three civilian bystandards.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM-Ethiopian forces kill seven civilians in Dac following a firefight with al Shabaab. Motive unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: AMISOM troops consisting of a Djiboutian contingent based in the Hawl Wadaag section of Beled Weyne town opened fire at a lorry on 15/12 after the driver of the lorry failed to heed orders to stop as he approached the base of AMISOM. The AMISOM soldiers shot at the vehicle, wounding the driver.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces are accused of killing six civilians travelling by bus in Qoryooey on the evening of either 12/16 or 12/17. AMISOM forces later admitted to the fact, but claimed the vehicle failed to stop when ordered.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces opened fire on a civilian minibus, six reported dead. The reason for the attack is not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM soldiers shot dead a mother and her four children at El Weregow area located near the port town of Marka, about 110Km south-west of Somali capital on Sunday afternoon, reasons not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: After an AMISOM convoy comes under attack by remote control IED at Km60 (perpetrators not known), the attacked soldiers open fire on a group of nearby civilians in anger, killing two.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: African Union [AU] forces have shot dead two pastoralists and 70 of their camels outside the port city of Barawe in Lower Shabelle region [southern Somalia] on Friday afternoon (6 December 2017). The attacks was an apparent reaction of anger after the convoy hit a landmine in the area. The perpetrators of the IED are not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An AMISOM soldier shoots and kills a civilian in Baraawe, reasons unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces shoot and kill two civilians, reasons unknown.

ACTOR1: Al Shabaab
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab executed a captured Ugandan soldier on video, releasing the footage on 18/01. The date of the murder itself is not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces shoot and kill an unarmed civilian near Wartaweyn. The soldiers may have believed the victim a member of al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Ten are killed and three captured by AMISOM Kenyan forces in a village known as Buloshid in the outskirts of Kismayo. Another 18 people were injured by the troops. Motovation not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An RCIED of unknown origin targeting an AMISOM convoy detonated in Shoodey settlement at Mahaday district. Causalities not known. AMISOM troops shot at suspected directions after the explosion killing two civilians travelling in a tricycle (Bajaj) behind the convoy. It was reported that AMISOM troops discovered another IED and safely dismantled it.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An AMISOM convoy hit an IED in Kurtunwaarey. The soldiers errantly returned fire, errantly killing a civilian.
